#define timespec_cmp ( a,
b,
op   ) 
Value:
((a).tv_sec == (b).tv_sec    \
        ? (a).tv_nsec op (b).tv_nsec \
        : (a).tv_sec op (b).tv_sec)

static void* swiril_gps ( void *  arg  )  [static]

swiril_gps thread entry point.

Implements the swiril_gps agent running under the RIL daemon on behalf of swigps which runs under the context of a different process
